title: 820-3332 no backlight
message:
This board was liquide damage arround lvds connector and lcd cable is damage too. Now have another retina assembly to test.
On board I replaced u9000 and lvds connector. Now I have 5V at L9000

Board power, mouse is on. Cannot see image with flashlight.  It is retina screen, I dont know if I can see. Cannot find scl and sda and eeprom supplay. Any idea what to check next?

title: 820-3332 no backlight
message: did you check for video on external monitor?

title: 820-3332 no backlight
message: Yes, video on external is Ok.  Mouse is on. Board is workingn but something happend arround lvds area.

title: 820-3332 no backlight
message: if you have another screen i would test with that. if still no video i would check the u9000 and area for the correct voltage( check while known good screen is plugged it).

title: 820-3332 no backlight
message:
[B]On board I replaced u9000 and lvds connector. Now I have 5V at L9000[/B]

 I think u9000 is ok as I already have 5V at L9000, but I dont know if that mean that the screen is recognized.

title: 820-3332 no backlight
message: Hold a flashlight on the back Apple logo and check if there is an image. Voltage on pin 1 of LCD conn?

title: 820-3332 no backlight
message:
pin 1 - 0V
No video at all

F9700 is ok

D9701 - 0V

title: 820-3332 no backlight
message: Bad LCD/connector/cable. Are you testing this with a 2012 LCD assembly?

title: 820-3332 no backlight
message:
I got this from ebay like: Mid 2012/Early 2013 Lcd Screen Full Assembly Apple MacBook Pro A1398 15" Display

Already I replaced lvds 3 days ago with MBP 13 2012 model. This is the correct lvds, right?

title: 820-3332 no backlight
message: Should be ok then. Check all DP lines from LCD connector to the caps (C9020-28). Maybe corroded trace, bad coils, missing caps?

title: 820-3332 no backlight
message: Ok, Will check all this, but what about missing backlight too? Or first appear image and later backlight?

title: 820-3332 no backlight
message: Without video on the screen there wil never be backlight.
